Synopis:

A dashing pirate uses his wits and flashing rapier to rescue a noblewoman from certain death in this comical high-seas adventure. The woman herself is an excellent swordswoman and she, the pirate, and his buddy Nick set sail to save Jamaica from the despotic rule of the villainous Lord Durant.
